Early Days of Ethereum

Articles and videos detailing the early days of the Ethereum project

  • Home
  • Articles
  • People
  • Videos
  • GitHub

Videos

Video episodes documenting the early days of Ethereum, featuring interviews with key participants and historical insights.

▶

Early Days of Ethereum

Episode 1 August 28, 2023

The first episode of the Early Days of Ethereum video series, independently produced by the co-Founders of BlockApps.

▶

Early Days of Ethereum - Part II

Episode 2 October 09, 2023

The second episode of the Early Days of Ethereum video series, continuing the exploration of Ethereum's founding period.

▶

Early Days of Ethereum - Episode III

Episode 3 November 08, 2023
Guests: Bob Summerwill

In the third installment, Bob Summerwill joined the co-Founders of BlockApps as a guest while he was still working as Executive Director of the ETC Cooperative.

▶

Early Days of Ethereum - Episode IV featuring Taylor Gerring

Episode 4 August 08, 2025
Guests: Taylor Gerring

After a long hiatus since Episode III, Taylor Gerring joined as a guest to talk about his experiences in the very early days of the Ethereum project, starting in December 2013.

Contributions welcome via issues and pull requests.
